A built-in compartment provides convenient storage for extra blade cartridges. Four rubber feet on the bottom help keep the trimmer in place while cutting and a molded-in carrying handle at the top makes transport easy. Overall measurements are 15-1/2x10-1/2x2-1/2 inches. This package contains one rotary trimmer. Imported.
